name: AltStore
subtitle: A home for apps that push the boundaries of iOS.
description:
This is the default source for AltStore. You can add additional sources to manage what apps appear in AltStore.

For more info, check out our FAQ: https://faq.altstore.io/patreon/beta-access/sources

apps.name: AltStore

versions.localizedDescription:
NEW

"Active Apps" Widget (iOS 17+)
‚Ä¢ View remaining days for ALL active apps from Home Screen
‚Ä¢ Refresh apps directly from home screen by tapping countdown timers

IMPROVED

Shortcuts
‚Ä¢ Converted existing "Refresh All Apps" shortcut into App Shortcut
‚Ä¢ Available by default in "App Shortcuts" section of Shortcuts app
‚Ä¢ Displays accurate progress when refreshing apps via Shortcuts app

Widgets
‚Ä¢ Updated existing home screen widget to support refreshing apps by tapping countdown (iOS 17+)
‚Ä¢ Fully compatible with macOS Sonoma

FIXED
‚Ä¢ Fixed AltJIT on iOS 17*
‚Ä¢ Fixed updating apps with manually removed extensions (e.g. uYou+)
‚Ä¢ Fixed not refreshing AltStore last when refreshing via Shortcut
‚Ä¢ Fixed Error Log not displaying all detailed info for certain errors

*Requires AltServer 1.7 (macOS)

‚Ä¢ Fixed error fetching Friend Zone patrons due to unexpected nil name
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect cell height for some News items

‚ö†Ô∏è You must manually install this update by re-installing AltStore with AltServer. You do NOT need to delete AltStore first.

This update fixes the "no provisioning profile with the requested identifier‚Ä¶" error when sideloading or refreshing apps.

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúClear Cache‚Äù button removes non-essential data to free up disk space
‚Ä¢ Sideload more than 3 apps via MacDirtyCow exploit*‚Ä†
‚Ä¢ Fixes crash when viewing Sources on iOS 12

*Requires iOS 14.0 - 16.1.2 (excluding 15.7.2). iOS 16.2+ not supported.
‚Ä†Visit faq.altstore.io for detailed instructions.

NEW

Lock Screen Widget (iOS 16+)
‚Ä¢ Counts down days until AltStore expires
‚Ä¢ Available in 2 different styles: "icon" and "text"

Error Log
‚Ä¢ View past errors in more detail
‚Ä¢ Tap an error to copy the error message or error code
‚Ä¢ Search for error code directly in AltStore FAQ
‚Ä¢ Access via new "Techy Things" section in settings

iOS Version Compatibility
‚Ä¢ Checks iOS compatibility for updates and installs 
‚Ä¢ Asks you to install latest compatible version if not supported
‚Ä¢ View unsupported updates from My Apps tab

Revamped Error Handling
‚Ä¢ Completely revamped error handling to make debugging issues as easy as possible
‚Ä¢ Revised error messages to be more descriptive and provide more suggestions
‚Ä¢ Includes more information with errors

Misc.
‚Ä¢ Pull-to-refresh to check for updates
‚Ä¢ Supports new ‚Äúversions‚Äù key in source JSON
‚Ä¢ Supports updating apps from app detail page

FIXED
‚Ä¢ Fixed "more" button appearing by mistake on app detail pages
‚Ä¢ Fixed widgets potentially not updating after refreshing apps
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect app name and iOS version in "Unsupported iOS version" error message
‚Ä¢ Fixed refreshing tweaked apps with removed app extensions
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect error toast view color when sign-in fails

apps.versionDescription:
‚Ä¢ Fixed error fetching Friend Zone patrons due to unexpected nil name
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect cell height for some News items
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This version of AltStore allows you to install Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS, as well as sideload other .ipa files from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: AltStore uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer.

news.title: Delta Gaining DS Support
news.caption: Available this Saturday for patrons, coming soon for everyone else.

news.title: Delta Now Available
news.caption: Finally, relive your favorite NES, SNES, GB(C), GBA, and N64 games.

news.title: Sideloading is Here!
news.caption: Update to AltStore 1.3 to install any app directly from Files.

news.title: iOS 13.4 Fixes App Crashes
news.caption: Update to iOS 13.4 to fix some sideloaded apps crashing on launch.

news.title: Clip Now Available!
news.caption: Finally, a clipboard manager that can run in the background ‚Äî no jailbreak required.

news.title: Delta, Meet Nintendo DS
news.caption: Update to Delta 1.3 to relive all your favorite Nintendo DS games.

news.title: #StandWithUkraine
news.caption: Find out how you can help support those impacted by the Russian invasion.

news.title: The Biggest AltServer Update Yet!
news.caption: Update to AltServer 1.5 to use AltJIT and other exciting new features.

news.title: More Apps in AltStore!
news.caption: Update to AltStore 1.5 to easily download some of our favorite apps.

news.title: New to AltStore?
news.caption: Check out our updated guide to learn how to sideload apps!
